titles.title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to clarify how controlled substance analogues that are imported or offered for import are to be regulated, and for other purposes.
SIMSA Act of 2021
SIMSA Act of 2021
Stop the Importation and Manufacturing of Synthetic Analogues Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Stop the Importation and Manufacturing of Synthetic Analogues Act of 2021 or the SIMSA Act of 2021
This bill establishes a process and requirements for regulating substances that have a similar chemical structure and actual or predicted effect as a controlled substance that is currently subject to such regulation because of its potential for abuse or dependence.
